ack.title: Acknowledgements
ack.p: The author would like to thank the The Medical School (FMB) of Sao Paulo State University (Unesp), Botucatu Campus and to UNIPEX. The author would also like to thank Clara Fumes Arruda, from the Multiprofessional Specialization Course in Adult Health, Hospital das CÃ­nicas, Medical School, Sao Paulo State University, for her contribution to the elaboration of the figure in this article.
This research did not receive any specific grant from funding agencies in the public, commercial, or not-for-profit sectors.
